title: Help needed
content:
Hi there,

I Have been looking for this specific brush font for a while, used the usual avenues but only to find similar. Any help would be greatly appreciated:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020055444im_/http:/typophile.com/files/text2_5508.jpg)
author: wezthengnius

comments.content: [Art Brush](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020055444/http:/www.dafont.com/artbrush.font?text=Plumbing+%26+Heating) by Gary D Jessey. (Don’t know about the legitimacy)
